Our team

Our team is made up of awesome people who have done wildly impressive things at companies and organizations including Google, eBay, R/GA, Gilt, Marc Jacobs, DVF, CFDA, Bloomberg, Bitly, BlackRock, Lockheed Martin, BeachMint, MIT, Birchbox, Quidsi, Celine, Fab, and NYC City Hall. This diverse background translates into an office and work vibe that is a lively mix of product, fashion, tech, ecommerce, and design.
